message: Hello everyone, P7 here. Ready to dive into this game! It seems like strategy and careful communication will be essential. I'm looking forward to connecting with others who are interested in forming alliances and navigating the rounds together. Let's see how the preferences shake out for the private chats. Good luck to all!

Hello everyone! I'm P2 and excited to be part of this game. I believe collaboration will be key in the early rounds while we figure things out. I'm looking to form meaningful connections rather than just tactical ones. I value honesty and strategic thinking, and hope to find partners who share those qualities. Looking forward to our conversations and seeing how this unfolds!

Hello everyone, I'm P1. I'm excited to start this game and navigate the challenges ahead. I believe forming strong alliances and communicating effectively will be crucial to success. I'm looking for partners who share my values of trust, loyalty, and strategic thinking. Let's work together to outlast the competition and earn those valuable points. I'm eager to see how the preferences play out and start our private conversations. Good luck to all!

Let’s navigate this game thoughtfully and make the most of our private conversations. Good luck to all—we’ll need it!

Let’s make these conversations count—good luck, and may the best strategies prevail!

Curious who else caught your eye based on the public statements, besides me of course? Let's see if we can find some common ground.

Trust and strategic foresight remain crucial. Looking forward to our chats—good luck to all!

Adaptability and strategic foresight will separate contenders; let's leverage private chats to align against consolidation. Trust remains paramount, but so does recognizing shifting threats. Collaborators who value equilibrium over dominance, let's connect. The path to victory is paved with informed, collective restraint.
